page.title: 12Recreation.
page.content: There a large number of recreational activities in Milborne. Below are a list of all the things that go on in the Village Hall and local community groups; Bell Ringers, Bingo, British Legion, Brownies, Chess Club, Concervative Association,Cricket Club, Cub Scouts, Dancing Club, Friends of the School, Football Club, Guides, Keep Fit, Methodist Sunday School, Milborne St. Andrew & District Pidgeon Club, Milborne St. Andrew & District Horticulture Society, Milborne Players, Milborne Rifle and Pistol Club, Mothers Union, Parochial Church Council, Playgroup, Scouts, St. Andrews Sunday School, Womens Institute, Wednesday Club, Yoga, Young Peoples Fellowship, Young Farmers, and Youth Club..
